preDeployCommand: python manage.py migrate && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python manage.py shell -c "import os; from django.contrib.auth import get_user_model; User=get_user_model(); username=os.getenv('DJANGO_ADMIN_USER','admin'); password=os.getenv('DJANGO_ADMIN_PASSWORD'); email=os.getenv('DJANGO_ADMIN_EMAIL','admin@example.com'); assert password, 'Missing DJANGO_ADMIN_PASSWORD'; u,_=User.objects.get_or_create(username=username, defaults={'email': email}); u.email=email; u.is_staff=True; u.is_superuser=True; u.set_password(password); u.save();"
deploy.startCommand: bash -lc "python manage.py migrate --noinput && python -m gunicorn apps.backend.config.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8000}"
